name: Find the Difference: Define II
description:
Play your favourite “Find the Difference” Game!

New design. New author's levels. Regular seasonal events. All in order to train your attention and brain even more, have fun and play with the whole family or with friends!

The game is 100% free and available for download now.

We tried to take all the best from the first part, created a unique one that includes the main favourite mechanics of finding differences between two pictures and supplemented it with contrasting and diverse content. Everything is done to make the process of the game interesting, and you couldn’t tear yourself away!

Different levels of difficulty and speed of searching for objects, and if you suddenly want something simpler - just use the zoom or hints!

A short guide on how to play:

1. Find 5 differences in two pictures in a limited time;
2. As you find the differences - click on them as quickly as possible to meet the given time and go to the next level;
3. You can choose what you want today: pass the main levels, or pass daily challenges;
4. You can also find a new adventure for yourself by completing seasonal events that you will see on the main screen!

Game highlights:

- Daily Challenges, Events, Bonus levels;
- Easy to play;
- Tons of levels, daily content updates;
- Automatic online progress save;
- Zoom and hints to help you find tricky differences;
- Doesn’t require a large amount of space on the device;
- Tutorial - learn how to play on the first level;
- Suitable for iPhone, iPad and iPod


This is a simple, rich and dynamic game that will allow you to keep your concentration in good shape, quietly spend your free time in pleasure and get a charge of good mood for the whole day!
If you are a fan of hidden object, spot the difference and puzzle games, then this will be the perfect choice for you!

Hurry up to download, we are waiting for you to become part of the family!
